lead_paragraph: Mr. Silver, who led the Assembly for 21 years, is to be sentenced next month in a $5 million corruption case.

headline.main: Sheldon Silver, Ex-New York Assembly Speaker, Is Disbarred

snippet: Mr. Silver, who led the Assembly for 21 years, is to be sentenced next month in a $5 million corruption case.
abstract: Former New York State Assemblyman Sheldon Silver is disbarred by State Supreme Court's Appellate Division following his conviction in $5 million corruption case.
